Description: As a new user, I want to register with my email and password, so that I can create a secure account.
As a registered user, I want to log in, so that I can access my private data.
As a user, I want my session to persist (JWT), so that I don't have to log in every time I refresh.
As a user, I want to see a list of households I belong to, so that I can select which workspace to enter.
As a new user, I want a default household created for me upon registration, so that I can start immediately.
As a user, I want the application to remember my last visited household, so that I am redirected there automatically upon login.
As a user, I want to see a high-level dashboard ("HomeView"), so that I can get an immediate overview of my household's status.
As a user, I want to see widgets for key metrics (e.g., Budget Health, Upcoming Bills), so that I can take quick actions.
As a household admin, I want to add members (people) to my household, so that I can track data specific to them.
As a user, I want to categorize members as "Adults" or "Children", so that the system can apply appropriate logic (e.g., financial ownership).
As a user, I want to record details like Date of Birth, so that the calendar can automatically populate birthdays.
As a user, I want to add pets to the household, so that I can track their specific needs (e.g., vet bills, insurance).
As a user, I want to view a dedicated list of pets, so that their information is organized separately from humans.
As a user, I want to catalog physical assets (electronics, furniture, etc.), so that I have a record for insurance and net worth calculations.
As a user, I want to record purchase value, replacement cost, and warranty expiry, so that I can manage lifecycle and financial risks.
As a user, I want to store encrypted serial numbers, so that I can retrieve them securely in case of theft.
As a user, I want to track vehicles (cars, bikes), so that I can manage their specific compliance and maintenance needs.
As a user, I want to track MOT and Tax due dates, so that I never miss a legal deadline.
As a user, I want to log service history (mileage, cost), so that I have a maintenance record for resale or upkeep.
As a user, I want a unified calendar view, so that I can see all household events in one place.
As a user, I want to see automatically generated events for Birthdays, MOTs, Insurance Renewals, and Bill Payments, so that I don't have to manually enter them.
As a user, I want to manually add one-off events, so that I can track ad-hoc appointments.
As a user, I want to maintain a library of meals/recipes, so that I can easily choose what to cook.
As a user, I want to assign meals to specific dates on a weekly planner, so that the household knows what's for dinner.
As a user, I want to store property details (e.g., WiFi password, emergency contacts), so that this information is easily accessible to all members.
As a user, I want to track Energy (Gas/Elec), Water, and Waste details, so that I can manage providers and costs.
As a user, I want to track Council Tax details, so that I can ensure payments are correct.
As a user, I want to record income sources (Salary, etc.) for each member, so that we can calculate total household inflow.
As a user, I want to specify the frequency and bank account for each income, so that cash flow projections are accurate.
As a user, I want to list Current Accounts with their balances, so that I know my liquid cash position.
As a user, I want to encrypt sensitive account numbers, so that my banking data is secure.
As a user, I want to track Savings Accounts and specific "Pots" (goals), so that I can monitor progress toward financial targets.
As a user, I want to track Investments (Stocks, Crypto) with unit counts and values, so that I can see my wider net worth.
As a user, I want to track Pensions, so that I can plan for retirement.
As a user, I want to track Credit Cards (Balance, Limit, APR), so that I can manage debt repayment.
As a user, I want to track Loans and Mortgages, so that I have a complete picture of liabilities.
As a user, I want to track Vehicle Finance specifically, so that it links to the relevant vehicle asset.
As a user, I want a centralized register of all recurring costs (Utilities, Subscriptions, Insurance), so that nothing is missed.
As a user, I want to link a cost to a specific asset or vehicle (e.g., "Car Insurance" linked to "Ford Fiesta"), so that the total cost of ownership is clear.
As a user, I want the system to project these costs onto the calendar ("Nearest Working Day" logic), so that I know exactly when money leaves my account.
As a user, I want to see a "Budget Progress" view, so that I can compare actual spending against the projected recurring costs for the month.
As a user, I want to close a budget cycle, so that I can archive the month's performance and reset for the next.
As a user, I want to update my personal profile (theme preference, password), so that I can customize experience.
As a user, I want to configure global application settings, so that I can toggle modules (e.g., turn off "Pets" if I don't have any).
As a user, I want to view system health or version history, so that I trust the platform's stability.
As a user, I want my account numbers and policy numbers to be encrypted in the database, so that my data is safe even if the DB is compromised.
As a household administrator, I want to assign 'Viewer' or 'Member' roles, so that I can control who can edit financial data.
As a user, I want to assign specific members to income or expense items, so that we can track who pays for what.
As a user, I want my bank account balance to automatically update when I mark a budget item as 'Paid', so that my records are always in sync.
As a user, I want updates to a 'Savings Pot' to automatically adjust the parent Savings Account balance, so that I don't have to double-entry data.
As a user, I want to be able to reset or delete a budget cycle if I made a mistake, so that I can start fresh for the month.
As a user, I want my Mortgage and Loan repayments to appear automatically in my recurring costs list, so that I don't have to manage them in two places.
As a user, I want recurring bills that fall on a weekend to automatically shift to the nearest working day on the calendar, so that I know the actual payment date.
As a user, I want to filter lists by 'Financial Profile' (e.g. Joint vs Personal), so that I can see relevant data contexts.
As a user, I want to select from multiple color themes (light/dark), so that the interface suits my visual preference.
As a user, I want large data tables to transform into stacked cards on mobile, so that I can read data easily on my phone.
As a user, I want to assign emojis to my accounts and categories, so that I can visually distinguish them quickly.
As a system, I want to run a comprehensive health check every night, so that regressions are caught immediately.
As a system, I want to automatically clean up test data after verification suites run, so that the database remains performant and clean.
As an admin, I want to export my entire household data (JSON/SQL), so that I can migrate or back it up (Data Portability).
As an admin, I want to permanently delete my household and all associated data, so that I can exercise my right to be forgotten.
As a user, I want to see a log of recent sign-ins, so that I can detect unauthorized access.
As a new user, I want a guided tour of the features, so that I can learn how to use the app quickly.
As a user, I want to see colorful charts of my spending breakdown, so that I can understand my finances at a glance.
As a user, I want to see a celebration animation when I stick to my budget, so that I feel rewarded.
As a user, I want to see visual progress bars for my savings pots, so that I stay motivated.
As a user, I want the theme to match my system settings automatically, for a seamless experience.
As a user, I want to rearrange widgets on my dashboard, so that the most important info is where I want it.
As a user, I want to receive email notifications for upcoming bills, so that I never miss a payment.
As a user, I want a shared shopping list that updates in real-time, so that multiple family members can add items.
As a user, I want a fun monthly summary of our household activity (like Spotify Wrapped), so that reviewing finances is engaging.
As an admin, I want to be able to export a tenant's data, so that I can move it to another instance or back it up.
As an admin, I want to be able to destroy a tenant, so that I can remove all trace of them from the system.
As a parent, I want to assign chores to my kids with point values, so that they are motivated to help around the house.
As a user, I want to track my kids' allowance based on completed chores, so that payout is easy and transparent.
As a child user, I want a simple view where I can check off my chores and see my points, so that I can feel independent.
As a user, I want to set a weekly food budget and track grocery receipts against it, so that I can control food spending.
As a user, I want to estimate the cost of a weekly meal plan based on ingredients, so that I can plan affordable weeks.
As a user, I want to track what I have in the pantry, so that I don't overbuy or waste food.
As a user, I want to compare 'Snowball' vs 'Avalanche' payoff methods, so that I can choose the strategy that saves me the most interest or time.
As a user, I want to see a projected 'Debt Free Date' based on my extra monthly payments, so that I have a clear light at the end of the tunnel.
As a parent, I want to record school term dates for each child, so that they are highlighted on the family calendar.
As a user, I want to see a projection of holiday costs (childcare, activities) during school holidays, so that I can budget for these expensive periods.
As a user, I want to toggle between 'Term Time' and 'Holiday' budget modes, so that I can adjust recurring meal and transport costs automatically.
As a user, I want to import a CSV bank statement, so that I can quickly reconcile my transactions.
As a user, I want the system to automatically suggest categories for my imported transactions based on the payee name, so that I save time on data entry.
As a user, I want the system to identify recurring payment dates from my history, so that my future budget projections are more accurate.
